description: Specifies a transformer on the log group to transform logs into consistent structured and information rich format.

LogGroupIdentifier.description: Existing log group that you want to associate with this transformer.
LogGroupIdentifier.markdownDescription:
Existing log group that you want to associate with this transformer.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: [\w#+=/:,.@-]*  
Update requires: Replacement

TransformerConfig.description: List of processors in a transformer
